title: Star Guardian Mordekaiser! Es Numero Uno.
body: I don't have a concept or anything like that, but just think about how badass the floating pink Master of Metal {{champion:82}} would be!

replies.body: Maybe not pink, though I saw a fan art for this that used a nice set of blues and purples.  The mace was interesting too as they made it a long staff with a large gold heart on the end.  Wish I could find it again to link it for you.
